TextView.android:text: The Blish is an Android application where one can find user's choice Printed Gifts, Flowers and Cakes sorted by different occasions. Android application having such facility are much less available with more cost and less user friendly GUI's along with less options and varieties of gifts, flowers and cakes. The Blish Android application where one can find better filtered gifts based on different occasions with lesser prices and 3-D image availability for objects with better, faster and user friendly GUI's providing personal security for images of users
